name: GenerativeArtificialIntelligence
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Experience the future of news with our Generative AI News Feed on Alexa! Imagine a world where news comes to you, perfectly tailored by AI that knows just what you like. Get ahead with personalized stories, breaking updates, and in-depth insights on your favorite topics. Say goodbye to scrolling fatigue — a simple voice command brings the world's news right to you. Activate our AI News Feed on Alexa now and revolutionize your news experience. Smarter, sharper news is waiting at the sound of your voice. Welcome to your new, AI-curated news journey
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
